home.popular_movies_description: Watch the latest and most popular movies online
home.tv_shows_description: Stream your favorite TV series and shows
home.seo_description_trending: Stream the latest movies and TV shows in HD quality on BingeWatch. Now trending: {{trending}}. Watch your favorite content anytime, anywhere.
home.seo_description_default: Stream the latest movies and TV shows in HD quality on BingeWatch. Watch your favorite content anytime, anywhere. Free streaming of popular movies and TV series.
home.sr_only_title: BingeWatch - Watch Movies & TV Shows Online

auth.login_seo_description: Sign in to your BingeWatch account to access your watchlist and continue streaming your favorite movies and TV shows.
auth.welcome_back: Welcome back! Please sign in to continue.
auth.verify_email_toast: Please verify your email address before signing in. Check your inbox for the confirmation link.
auth.invalid_credentials_toast: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
auth.login_failed_toast: Failed to sign in. Please try again.
auth.register_seo_description: Create your BingeWatch account to start streaming your favorite movies and TV shows.
auth.join_message: Join BingeWatch to start watching your favorite content.
auth.register_success_toast: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account.
auth.register_failed_toast: Failed to create account. Please try again.

profile.seo_description: Manage your BingeWatch profile settings and preferences.
profile.title: Profile Settings

watchlist.title: My Watchlist
watchlist.seo_description: Your saved movies and TV shows to watch later.
watchlist.heading: My Watchlist
watchlist.empty_message: Start adding movies and TV shows to your watchlist to watch them later.

history.title: Watch History
history.seo_description: Your recently watched movies and TV shows.
history.heading: Watch History
history.empty_message: Your watch history will appear here once you start watching content.

top_rated.title: Top Rated Movies & TV Shows
top_rated.seo_description: Watch the highest rated movies and TV shows of all time. Stream critically acclaimed content in HD quality.
top_rated.seo_keywords: top rated movies, best tv shows, highest rated, watch online, streaming
top_rated.heading: Top Rated

latest.seo_description_movies: Watch the latest movies in theaters. Stream new releases in HD quality.
latest.seo_description_tv_shows: Watch the latest TV shows on air. Stream new releases in HD quality.
latest.seo_keywords_movies: new movies, latest releases, watch online, streaming
latest.seo_keywords_tv_shows: new tv shows, latest releases, watch online, streaming
latest.no_movies_message: There are no movies currently playing in theaters.
latest.no_tv_shows_message: There are no TV shows currently on air.

trending.title: Trending Movies & TV Shows
trending.seo_description: Discover what's trending in movies and TV shows. Watch the most popular content online in HD quality.
trending.seo_keywords: trending movies, trending tv shows, popular movies, popular tv shows, watch online
trending.heading: Trending

comments.sign_in_to_react: Please sign in to react to comments
comments.no_comments_yet: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!

not_found.title: 404 - Page Not Found
not_found.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

search.title: Search Movies & TV Shows
search.seo_description_query: Find and watch "{{query}}" movies and TV shows online in HD quality. Stream your favorite content instantly.
search.seo_description_default: Search and discover movies and TV shows to watch online. Stream in HD quality for free.
search.seo_keywords: search movies, search tv shows, {{query}}, watch online, streaming
search.no_results_description: We couldn't find any matches for "{{searchTerm}}". Try different keywords or filters.

watch.seo_description: Stream {{title}} ({{year}}) online free in HD on BingeWatch. {{overview}}...

genre.seo_description: Watch {{genreName}} {{mediaType}} online. Stream the best {{genreName}} content in HD quality.
